rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A spacious living room with Mediterranean style decor, featuring warm wooden accents and neutral tones. Open view towards the central courtyard for natural light.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: A dining area designed with Mediterranean elements, open to the kitchen for a seamless flow of space.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A comfortable guest bedroom with a balcony overlooking the garden. Incorporates Mediterranean design, ensuring tranquility.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A well-equipped kitchen with modern amenities and Mediterranean decor to blend style and functionality.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: An attached bathroom for the guest room, featuring efficient layout and Mediterranean fixtures.

openings.name: Front Entrance
openings.description: A grand entrance in line with Mediterranean aesthetics, allowing access to the living and dining areas while maintaining Vastu principles.

openings.name: Central Courtyard Access
openings.description: A door leading directly into the central courtyard, enhancing natural ventilation and daylighting in compliance with Vastu.

openings.name: Garden Access
openings.description: A dedicated opening that connects the apartment to the large garden area, promoting relaxation and fresh air.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A spacious master bedroom with Mediterranean style and ample storage, providing a serene retreat. Positioned according to Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Second Bedroom
rooms.description: A comfortable secondary bedroom with Mediterranean design, ideal for personal space or study. Aligned with Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Master Bathroom
rooms.description: A well-appointed bathroom adjoining the master bedroom, designed for privacy and ease of use.

openings.name: Upper Floor Staircase Access
openings.description: A staircase connecting the ground floor and upper floor, ensuring smooth transition between levels.

rooms.name: Storage Room
rooms.description: A functional storage room for appliances and extra belongings, designed with Mediterranean simplicity.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: A utility space for laundry and other household chores, seamlessly integrated into the design.

openings.name: Basement Access
openings.description: A secure and well-lit entrance to the basement storage area.

rooms.name: Central Courtyard
rooms.description: A vibrant central courtyard featuring Mediterranean landscaping, water features, and seating areas for outdoor relaxation.

openings.name: Courtyard Entry Door
openings.location: Multiple access points from living room and dining area
openings.description: Provides direct access to the central courtyard, enhancing the flow of natural light and air.
